alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Kofa; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 2:41AM MST until December 15 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 3 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Kofa, Parker Valley and Central La Paz County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 3 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central La Paz; Kofa; Parker Valley
